§ 7786. Authorization of appropriations(a) GrantsTo carry out section 7783 of this title, there are authorized to be appropriated to the Secretary $7,500,000 for each of fiscal years 2005 through 2009, of which not more than 5 percent of the funds made available for a fiscal year may be used by the Secretary for administrative costs.
(b) AgreementsTo carry out section 7784 of this title, there are authorized to be appropriated to the Secretary $7,500,000 for each of fiscal years 2005 through 2009, of which not more than 5 percent of the funds made available for a fiscal year may be used by the Secretary for administrative costs of Federal agencies.
(Pub. L. 106–224, title IV, § 457, as added Pub. L. 108–412, § 1, Oct. 30, 2004, 118 Stat. 2324.)
